Hey <@U017J1W2X8R>, this is currently not possible with the webhook action, but it is something that we are considering for the future. I’m curious how you’d expect this to work—do you only care about specifying which properties are included, or would you also want to customize the format of the payload that the webhook action sends?

In terms of workarounds, if including the extra properties is causing a problem, you could create a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|custom workflow action> and specify which properties you want in the `objectRequestOptions` that are mentioned in the docs.
Does the website grader tool not work on sites using a .dev domain name? I can run another domain through, but my .dev domain always says that it can’t run right now. All the graders are busy.

Hi everyone, I'm a developer and very new to HubSpot. Could anyone guide me which channel/section/page/course I should start to build an email template please? Any steps-to-steps example would be really appreciated. Big thanks

You have to just change CSS from your website by overriding the HubSpot style.
Let me know if there have any other concerns.
